content.en: Automated CFAE Detection: Researchers are using custom software algorithms to automatically detect complex fractionated atrial electrograms (CFAEs) in patients with atrial fibrillation. These algorithms analyze the electrical signals in the left atrium to accurately identify CFAEs and guide ablation for atrial fibrillation termination. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to measure the temporal variation, electrophysiologic characteristics, and spatial relationships of CFAEs, providing valuable insights into the stability and patterns of atrial fibrillation.
content.da: Automatiseret CFAE-detektion: Forskere bruger specialudviklede softwarealgoritmer til automatisk at detektere komplekse fraktionerede atriale elektrogrammer (CFAE'er) hos patienter med atrieflimren. Disse algoritmer analyserer de elektriske signaler i venstre atrium for nøjagtigt at identificere CFAE'er og vejlede ablation for ophør af atrieflimren. Derudover udvikles algoritmer til at måle den tidsmæssige variation, elektrofysiologiske egenskaber og rumlige relationer af CFAE'er, hvilket giver værdifulde indsigter i stabiliteten og mønstrene af atrieflimren.
